item.description:
UPDATE: The location has changed! Due to a power outage, at Renee's home the event will be moved to my house. Again, seating is limited.

PLEASE RSVP for this as seating is limited!

It’s getting to be that time of year again—please join us to learn (or be reminded) how to use our online bill review system. If you think you can spend any time at all in late December (I hope the bills are online by then!) and January and beyond (until we’re done!), we really need you help. All members welcome! If you have a laptop, bring it. If not, you will be able to share with someone who does.
item.name: NHLA Bill Review Training
